alert.note: Alert for Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grant, southeastern Garland, south central Saline and northeastern Hot Spring Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lonsdale, or 10 miles southeast of Hot Springs Village, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benton... Bryant... Haskell... Traskwood... Tull... Lonsdale... Salem in Saline County... Bauxite... Nance... Shaw... Glen Rose... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 103 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and southwestern Arkansas.
